notes.text: We now ensure that the display property of action parameters is correctly calculated using the ValueList reference annotations
The RichTextEditor is now correctly displayed in edit mode when an object is created
Key users can now save changes made in the configuration dialog of key user adaptation after closing and reopening the dialog
You can now define groups of action parameters in the action parameter dialog
Key users can now enable the interactive row count mode of a table
We now ensure that fields with a currency or units of measure in a table are correctly aligned along the decimal separator
Key users can now modify the default value of the scrollThreshold parameter to optimize data loading in tables
We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
You can now use the applyState and retrieveState APIs to store and retrieve states of custom sections and subsections
We have added a change event in the FormElements building block
We now provide an option to aggregate data based on the visible table columns in analytical list page applications
We now ensure that the mandatory fields function correctly for navigation properties in the filter bar
Adding items in a multi-input field with side effects now works correctly
We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
We've now resolved an issue where the draft indicator wasn't displayed for the draft of an active record
We now ensure that the value help field with fixed values in the action parameter dialog shows the correct values
We’ve resolved an issue where the app was failing to load while creating a default variant that involved removing and adding a field
You can now apply sorting to micro charts in tables
We've resolved an issue that occurred with fields containing navigation properties in a containment scenario
Enabled settings of menus are now applied correctly when menu items have their own enabled settings defined
You can now show a message strip in a custom action dialog
We now ensure that type-ahead is not shown in case of non-empty field values
Navigation properties that are applicable to line items and annotated with TextArrangement as TextOnly are now available for filtering in tables
Key users can now enable the interactive row count mode of a table
Visibility settings of menus are now applied correctly when menu items have their own visibility settings defined
We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the context menu of tables
We now ensure the default values of action parameters are defined before setting them as binding data
We now ensure that the action parameter dialog stays open when the user cancels a 412 warning message
Sorting by currency or unit of measure properties that reference texts now works correctly
You can now set the rowCountMode property to 'Interactive' for grid tables in the manifest.json file
We've resolved an issue where the personalization settings in the Chart building block weren't being considered
We now ensure that text binding for an externalID with a semantic object works correctly
We now wait for context to be created before extracting the inParameter for the value help dialog
We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
We now correctly apply 1:n association filters when loading variants
We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
We now display all the decimal places for quantities with measures in display mode, with an option to limit the decimal places based on the unit of measure
We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
We now consider the enableAutoColumnWidth and widthIncludingColumnHeader properties in the manifest.json file when adding a column to a table
Tables in the value help dialog are now rendered as responsive tables on mobile devices
We now use a modifer to retrieve the existing PropertyInfo when the Remove condition is called
We've resolved an issue where a duplicate ID error was shown on a section breakout
We now also consider the text arrangement annotation when a second filter field with a value help is opened from within a value help dialog
We’ve resolved an issue where the value help didn't work for create and inline create
We now ensure that dynamic binding works correctly when read-only fields are cloned
